info.title: HTML Content Object
info.description: Creates an html content object for the modules.

method.name: build
method.description: Build the outer html content container.

method.name: buildElement
method.description: Build the HTMLContent element with an element that the user built.

method.name: append
method.description: Appends an element to the HTMLContent root element.
method.returndescription: Returns NULL if the element given is empty. Returns the HTMLContent object otherwise.

method.name: getActionFactory
method.returndescription: Returns an instance of the Action Factory.

method.name: getModuleContainer
method.description: Builds a module container and returns the DOMElement.

parameter.name: $action
parameter.description: The name of the auxiliary of the module (if any).

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A set of attributes to be passed to the module with GET method during loading.

parameter.name: $startup
parameter.description: Sets the module to load at startup (next content.modified).

parameter.name: $containerID
parameter.description: The id of the module container as a DOM Object.

method.name: addReportContent
method.description: Adds a report content to the server report.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder of the content (as a css selector).

parameter.name: $method
parameter.description: The HTMLServerReport replace or append method (use const).

method.name: getReport
method.description: Returns the HTML Report for this html content.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder to get the content.

parameter.name: $method
parameter.description: The report method. For more information, see HTMLServerReport.
